jcr:content.jcr:title: Virgin Islands at the 2004 Summer Olympics

contentheadline.headline: Virgin Islands at the 2004 Summer Olympics

contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Olympics Virgin Islands |games=2004 Summer |competitors=6 (5 men and 1 woman) |sports=4 |flagbearer=[[LaVerne Jones]] |officials= }} The '''[[United States Virgin Islands]]''' competed at the '''[[2004 Summer Olympics]]''' in [[Athens]], [[Greece]]. ==Results by event== ===[[Athletics at the 2004 Summer Olympics|Athletics]]=== '''Men's 100 metres:''' * [[Adrian Durant]] - Round 1, 10.52 s (52nd place) '''Women's 100 metres:''' * [[LaVerne Jones]] - Round 2, 11.44 s (did not advance) '''Women's 200 metres:''' * [[LaVerne Jones]] - Round 1: 23.20 s, Round 2: 23.09 s ===[[Sailing at the 2004 Summer Olympics|Sailing]]=== '''Laser mixed''' * [[Timothy Pitts]] - 381pts (41st place) ===[[Shooting at the 2004 Summer Olympics|Shooting]]=== '''Men's 10m Air Pistol:''' * [[Chris Rice (sport shooter)|Chris Rice]] - 551pts (46th place) '''Men's 50m Pistol:''' * Chris Rice - 529pts (41st place) ===[[Swimming at the 2004 Summer Olympics|Swimming]]=== '''Men's 50m Freestyle:''' * [[Josh Laban]] - Heat: 23.43 '''Men's 100m Freestyle:''' * [[George Gleason]] - Heat: 51.69 '''Men's 100m Backstroke:''' * George Gleason - Heat: 57.64 ==Officials== *President: Hans Lawaetz *Secretary General: Angel L. Morales ==See also== *[[U.S. Virgin Islands at the 2003 Pan American Games]] ==References== *[http://www.sports-reference.com/olympics/countries/ISV/summer/2004/ sports-reference] {{Nations at the 2004 Summer Olympics}} [[Category:Nations at the 2004 Summer Olympics]] [[Category:Virgin Islands at the Olympics|2004 Summer Olympics]] [[Category:2004 in the United States Virgin Islands|Olympics]]
